summary: This module integrates Dialogflow with Home Assistant by exposing an HTTP endpoint that receives webhook POST requests containing intent data. It parses the incoming payload, matches intents to configured Home Assistant actions (including optional asynchronous actions), constructs appropriate speech responses, and returns them in the format expected by Dialogflow. It also defines custom error handling for Dialogflow interactions.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant to be controlled through Dialogflow conversational agents, translating spoken intents into Home Assistant actions and providing spoken feedback via webhook responses.
